Static Public Attributes

Detailed Description
Represents the parameters associated with a specific trial.
This class is used to encapsulate details about a single trial parameter, with its unique identifier, name, internal value, and associated distribution. It extends from the Base_message class.
distribution (Dict[str, Any]): A dictionary defining the distribution of the parameter values.
